column5: 94- 5 star reviews. Quiet getaway on 2 acres. Within 20 to 25 minutes from Waco or Temple Texas. 1 full size bed in upstairs loft . In ground pool, gas/charcoal grill access. 182 approx sq. ft with Compost Toilet &rainfall shower in downstairs bath. Perfect opportunity to stay in a Tiny House and visit the Silos all in one trip. Moderate Cancelation Policy.
column8: The Original Waco Tiny House as seen on HGTV
